title: Love Letters from Spirit: Your Relationship with Your Soul, Your Higher Self, and God
description: This is a spiritual book to read, re-read, and keep forever.Become empowered as you form a partnership with God to change your life and change the world!Love Letters from Spirit shares reassuring wisdom from a unique perspective beyond our physical dimension. In a series of loving messages received through channeled writing, Spirit Guides assure us the universe is not random. Its dynamics are absolutely purposeful and benevolent. It is divinely designed to continually support our spiritual growth.The foundation of Creation is Divine Love and Oneness. You owe it to yourself to understand how to cooperate with something so powerful and life-changing.Open your heart, develop your gifts, be an expression of your soul, and make your highest contribution to Planet Earth.
author: Laura Dickenson
